tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was extremely paranoid about my visit to the dentist for my root canal. It was amazing to see how well both the doctors calmed me down and patiently worked with me and my paranoia ...

The orthodontist assigned for me was brilliant! He was gentle and very systematic and organized. The medical procedure was explained well and post treatment care as well as the next steps in the procedure was explained in detail by the doctor. 

The doctors in this clinic have good connections with various specialists as well. I must say after this, my faith in dentists has been restored. Thank you very much. 

Regards,
Vaishnavi Shankar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had  to be treated for tooth removal  so through a friend I came to know about Dr.Anshul. From day 1 of treatment still date I had a smooth journey and everything was explained and done at my convenience and comfort. The process was also done very professional and painless. Post treatment after the tooth removal was taken care perfectly and the doc was just a call away for the entire process. I would definitely recommend the doctor to all as she is extremely good at her work and friendly too.
